item.title: career questions
item.description: is working for microsoft in gpus what im truly passionate about? more interested in computational poetry & poetry in general want to work more on design contract-based data vis & design place when would you know you made it?

item.title: goodreads redesign
item.description: problems: as an avid reader disconnected from my friends its hard for me to maintain digital book clubs scheduling issues remembering the book we discussed as a poetry lover its hard for me to find fellow poetry lovers online im reading too many books at once difficult to discuss think pieces together finding ppl interested -> sending them article -> reading it / dissecting it together ideas: feature to sync up reading amongst devices accountability tracker (nudge ppl to read) find other ppl reading same book as u to chat creating a book club with other people recommending books based on someoneâ€™s book tastes discovery for new books

item.title: side proj ideas
item.description: ideas #career poetechnics https://news.mit.edu/2023/poetechnics-podcast-0518 data visualization of the books I read in 2023 what data did I collect in 2023? number of flights travelled 2023 travel report amount of money spent I want to practice front end dev using telescopic text on ur website Goodreads redesign [[tech/goodreads redesign|goodreads redesign]] data of books scrape good reads data import books as a cdv building ur personal library something to collect and compel me to write online hand written notes online doodles copenhagen bike share / biking lane visualization vs nyc bike share / biking lane scrolling stories https://www.
